mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{tNo}, #{userNo}, #{rtitle}, #{gcontent}, #{bcontent}, #{score1}, #{score2}, #{score3}, #{score4}, #{score5}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select:
SELECT r.*, m.nickname, m.profilename ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likey where rno = r.rno) likeCount FROM review r JOIN member m on(r.USERNO = m.USERNO) WHERE
TNO = #{tNo} AND
r.RSTATUS = 'N' ORDER BY RDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM TEACHER WHERE TNO = #{tNo} AND TSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TOTAL < 3 THEN 1 END) REVIEW_0, COUNT(CASE WHEN TOTAL < 4 AND TOTAL >= 3 THEN 1 END) REVIEW_1, COUNT(CASE WHEN TOTAL > 4 THEN 1 END) REVIEW_2 FROM (SELECT (SCORE1 + SCORE2 + SCORE3 + SCORE4 + SCORE5)/5 TOTAL FROM REVIEW WHERE TNO = #{tNo})
SELECT R.*, M.PROFILENAME, T.TNAME, T.SUBJECT, T.COMPANY FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M, TEACHER T WHERE R.USERNO = M.USERNO AND R.TNO = T.TNO ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT R.*, T.TNAME, T.PROFILENAME, T.SUBJECT, T.COMPANY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likey where rno = R.rno) likeCount FROM REVIEW R, TEACHER T WHERE R.TNO = T.TNO ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKEY WHERE R.RNO = LIKEY.RNO) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RSTATUS = 'Y' WHERE RNO = #{rno}
